txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Pure black skin from the worms surrounding Gabilshathûr. Delivery of the items should be made to Avar at the dwarf-outpost.
'The skin from the worms nearby make good patching for the roofs around here. Can you get us some more?'
Thorin's Hall Task: Pure Black Skin
The dwarves at Gabilshathûr await a delivery of pure black skin to be made to Avar.
Deliver the pure black skin to Avar at Gabilshathûr in Angmar
You have accepted a task to collect and deliver pure black skin from the worms surrounding Gabilshathûr to Avar at the dwarf-outpost.
Wanted: Pure black skin from the worms surrounding Gabilshathûr.
